column4: im running ubuntu 9.04 on my laptop and have a strange problem
i cant watch youtube/streamed videos when ive connected my TV to it
i can only watch in small screen cant use fullscreen
any idea what to do?
ubuntu 10.04 ....
do you know if you have the drivers for your video card installed?
yeah
regular movies works etc
and drivers are installed for everything
just youtube in full screen doesn't work pierre_?
ANY streamed video via browser
works on normal but not fullscreen
is this a new installation of ubuntu?
didnt work on my old one either
ive had the installation for 3-4 months tho
which browser are you using?
firefox
do you have chromium?
nah getting it
brb
ok
tried with chrome, didnt work i still get the video on my laptop instead of the TV
even tho i have the browser on the TV screen not the laptop
